summary: Find what is hiding benath the Ebony Order activities.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://www.freegamesunity.com/Mother_of_Tears/Images/Nexus/MoT%20Title%20800.jpg[/img]


[url=http://skyrimmotheroftears.com/Index.html][img]http://www.skyrimmotheroftears.com/Site/Images/UI/dungeon%20Ebony3%20x800.jpg[/img][/url]

This Dungeon is part of the [url=http://skyrimmotheroftears.com/Index.html]Mother of Tears[/url] add on. For more information, click on the banner.
[/center]

[u][color=#fff0f5]-  Ebony Tower:[/color][/u] [spoiler]Hidden behind the Eastern Montains, the Ebony tower is hosting the Order of Ebony, a secret society. Make your way to the entrance, recently located west of the Shor\'s Watchtower.[/spoiler]
author: Vyemm
